name: BAD BILLY 2D VR
description: Billy is really angry! Billy's girlfriend Jessica was kidnapped by creatures from a 2D World. Billy has to follow the creatures into the 2D World to free Jessica.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel Core i5 3570 or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or better Storage: 350 MB available space
